result.execSummary:
Isaiah L Bland l was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Isaiah L Bland l was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah L Bland l

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: CASH BOND RETURNED TO CLERK OF COURT'S OFFICE UNSIGNED

Defendant Isaiah L Bland in court, in custody.  Clifford C. Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    DEFENDANT WAIVES EXTRADITION.  DEFENDANT WAIVES AN ATTORNEY.  JUDGE COLLOQUES THE THE DEFENDANT ON WAIVER OF ATTY.  JUDGE ACCEPTS WAIVER OF ATTORNEY.  JUDGE WATCHES DEFENDANT SIGN WAIVER OF CONSENT.
Extradition hearing rescheduled from April 3, 2014 to March 18, 2014, due to the Defendant having waived his right.
Extradition hearing on April 3, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Not to leave the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant Isaiah L Bland in court via video, in custody.  Clifford C. Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   JUDGE REVIEWS CHARGES/PENALTIES WITH DEFENDANT.  PUBLIC DEFENDER NOTICE GIVEN TO DEFENDANT. State - $20,000 Cash bond - Not leave State of Wisconsin - Judge - $20,000 Cash Bond - Not to Leave the State of Wisconsin  Extradition hearing scheduled for April 3, 2014 at 09:30 am.
